justifications: Who would have thought that the European Union would lose or, rather, that Great Britain people would do the unthinkable, the unexpected and, on the face of it, the unwise thing by voting to break away from the European Union

Who would have thought that the European Union would lose or, rather, that Great Britain people would do the unthinkable, the unexpected and, on the face of it, the unwise thing by voting to break away from the European Union
Indeed, as the British government, political pundits, economists and all the wise men and women of England did not consider the possibility of England out of the EU
Now, while American experts, mostly Democrats or Independents, but even some Republicans, could not and cannot imagine a Trump presidency

the probability of this possibility is, nonetheless, real, just as the Republican electorate cared less about all the reasons, scary ones, non-scary ones, real and unreal ones given to them by reasonable, experienced and wise presidential candidates
